public class UpdateManager
extends java.lang.Object

Handles updates from simulation steps (also for grids).

initializeObjects

public void initializeObjects(InitialState initialState,
                              XMLReader reader)
Retrieves all objects that are available at the simulations initial state and stores a local copy of them inside of a hash map. Also the view that is associated to an objects ID is loaded.

Parameters:
initialState -
reader -
